name: Google+ Send Feedback Button remove
description: Removes Google+ Send Feedback button on the bottom right side using display:none.
additional_info:
Based on href, couldn't find any other way, so if you use another language than english you might want to change url from /intl/en/+/learnmore/forum/ to something else. If you look at source code of the page, you should find the LI element by searching for class "gbe gbmtc" and inside is the A element with right href.

Long out of webdesign, or if you will, Webcoding-anything. So the description might be mess, sry.
